PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>

INSERT 
	{ 	?dist dgov:license <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/168> .
		?dist dcterms:licensen ?rights .
		?dist dcterms:rights ?rights }
WHERE
	{	?dist a dcat:Distribution .
		?dist dcterms:language ?lang 	
		VALUES(?lang ?rights) {
			( <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/NLD> <http://statbel.fgov.be/nl/statistieken/opendata/licentie/> )
			( <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/FRA> <http://statbel.fgov.be/fr/statistiques/opendata/licence/> )
		}
	}
